name: Laksh Pradhwani
about: Laksh Pradhwani is an 18-year-old Full-Stack Developer & Aspiring AI/ML Engineer. Class 12 student at Sunbeam School Lahartara (PCM + CS). Interested in hackathons, robotics, and clean UI.

education.details: Class 10 — House Captain, Leadership Programs, Sports

experience.details: React, Redux, Firebase. Built dynamic UIs and managed state.
Built GigX platform core features, Auth pages, and CRUD dashboards using Django & REST APIs.
Managed hotel software, automation workflows, and IT security.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.summary: A fully animated personal portfolio with clean UI, micro-interactions, responsive design, and smooth transitions.

projects.name: Stranger Things 3D
projects.summary: An immersive 3D web experience inspired by Stranger Things, featuring upside-down effects and interactive elements.

projects.name: Helios Music Player
projects.summary: Lightweight web music player with responsive design and animated controls.

projects.name: CaliBridge — Event Calendar App
projects.summary: JavaScript-based event calendar with event creation, month switching, LocalStorage sync, and responsive UI.

projects.name: Artist Portfolio — Artistry
projects.summary: A clean and responsive artist portfolio built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Balanced gallery and smooth animations.

projects.name: MVP Webstore — Shopping Demo
projects.summary: Front-end MVP e-commerce demo with product listings and a basic cart.

achievements: VVM Science Exam: School & District Topper
